channel.title: How to make it so u can use 1 item with another to create a 3rd?
channel.description: Heyy um, how do i make it so i can use a GS blade with a hilt, and itll exchange them for the GS?

item.title: How to make it so u can use 1 item with another to create a 3rd?
item.dc:creator: @OMGNUGGETS OMGNUGGETS
item.description:
@OMGNUGGETS wrote:

here is a example

			if (playerHasItem(4703, 1) && playerHasItem(6575, 1)
					&& ((itemUsed == 4703) || (otherItem == 4703))
					&& ((itemUsed == 6575) || (otherItem == 6575))) {
				if (playerHasItem(-1)) {
					deleteItem(4703, 1);
					deleteItem(6575, 1);
					addItem(6583, 1);
					sM("Your Onyx ring transforms into the Powerful Ring of Stone.");
				} else {
					sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
				}
			}

I know im Gravedigging but i couldnt resist.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so u can use 1 item with another to create a 3rd?

item.title: How to make it so u can use 1 item with another to create a 3rd?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Pwnage Sh0w:

ROFL!!! Dude you need 1 godsword blade, 1 gs hilt, and i think either 1 or 2 gs shards.

He’s not asking if he’s got the correct runescape way, he just wants to do that way.

Dylan: you should put it in your item on item packet, deleting the two old items and adding a new one (with some validation of course).

Read full topic
